content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0)

### Lab at position
Consists of a lab with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 67}

### Electricity distribution at position
Consists of an electricity group with id 7679 and poles at positions (x=2.5, y=2.5), (x=4.5, y=5.5), (x=8.5, y=9.5), (x=2.5, y=1.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when researching Automation
-  Ensure you have automation science packs in your inventory before attempting to research Automation
-  Make sure the lab has automation science packs before attempting to research Automation

### Errors when inserting items into a lab
-  Ensure you have the items to insert into the lab before attempting to insert them

### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Ensure the output of the burner mining drill is not blocked by items on the ground
-  Ensure there is a sink entity in place to accept the output of the burner mining drill

### Errors when using furnaces
-  Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt
-  Ensure the furnace is fueled before attempting to smelt

### Errors when using boilers
-  Ensure the boiler is fueled before attempting to use it
-  Ensure the boiler has a connection to a pipe before attempting to use it

### Errors when using offshore pumps
-  Ensure the offshore pump has a connection to a pipe before attempting to use it

### Errors when using steam engines
-  Ensure the steam engine has a connection to a pipe before attempting to use it
-  Ensure the steam engine is fueled before attempting to use it

### Errors when using pipe groups
-  Ensure the pipe group is connected to a fluid source before attempting to use it
-  Ensure the pipe group is connected to a fluid sink before attempting to use it

### Errors when using electricity groups
-  Ensure the electricity group is connected to a power source before attempting to use it
-  Ensure the electricity group is connected to a power sink before attempting to use it
